variable.comment: Maximum Fear the user has available
variable.name: TotFear

variable.comment: Amount of Fear the user currently has
variable.name: CurFear

variable.comment: Seconds interval between spawning a new enemy.
variable.name: EnemySpawnTime

sub-events.comment: Kick off the first enemy moving.
Every 2 seconds, but gradually reducing the interval, spawn a new enemy and move it to the target.
Every time an enemy spawn, the spawn interval reduces slightly. This makes them very gradually come faster! Make sure it doesn't go below every 0.5 seconds though.
Once a path has been found, start moving along it.
When bullets hit enemies, make it subtract from health and spawn some particles.
Destroy enemies with no health left, throwing in a particles effect.
When an enemy reaches the target, destroy it, but also pick a random turret and destroy that.
Tell the turrets to target the enemies.
To prevent bullets that miss flying across the whole screen, destroy them when they've travelled out of range.
Create new turrets by touching the walls.
